entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-d'Espoir 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NNE 50 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this morning then changing to freezing rain this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 16 January 2023
